Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Case.Account}:
To add or remove any authorized users from the fuel account and/or update the physical or mailing address we require a written request on the company letterhead. The letter should include full contact information for any person(s) being added, reflect the account number to be updated, as well as the name and position title of the signer. The letter needs to be signed by a person of authority within the company, or an existing authorized user. Once complete send the letter to customer service to have it processed.
Before you submit please make sure:
Written on Company Letterhead
Contains full contact information of New Contacts
Title and signature of an Officer, or existing Authorized User
Customer Service:
Email: correspondence@wexinc.com
Fax: 800-395-0809
Receivables and Credit Management
